name: Landscape Profile Backgrounds
description:
About


This is a simple template file for creating profile header images for Landscape.


Landscape is a community-assembling software client for Urbit.


How to use this template


Duplicate this frame, delete every layer from it, and arrange whatever imagery you’d like within the frame to suit your needs.


Export your frame by clicking its title (in the layers list or in the drawing surface) and invoking the “Export” command:


CMD/CTRL + SHIFT + E


Upload the image to your Landscape profile as you normally would.


Need Help?


Message me at ~fabled-faster


P.S.


I’ll be uploading personal backgrounds to this file over time. They are characterized by their collage-like nature and monochromatic appearance. Feel free to use them if you like.
